abstract: Editorial outlines how New York Gov Andrew Cuomo's executive action establishing statewide protections for transgender New Yorkers was sorely needed; urges governors in other states to follow Cuomo's example.
lead_paragraph: Statewide regulations that protect transgender people from discrimination, established through an executive action by Gov. Andrew Cuomo, set an important example for the rest of the country.

headline.main: New York Leads the Way on Transgender Rights
headline.print_headline: New York Leads the Way on Transgender Rights

snippet: Statewide regulations that protect transgender people from discrimination, established through an executive action by Gov. Andrew Cuomo, set an important example for the rest of the country.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
